titleStmt.title: The commonvvealth and gouernment of Venice. VVritten by the Cardinall Gasper Contareno, and translated out of Italian into English, by Lewes Lewkenor Esquire. VVith sundry other collections, annexed by the translator for the more cleere and exact satisfaction of the reader. With a short chronicle in the end, of the liues and raignes of the Venetian dukes, from the very beginninges of their citie
De magistribus et republica Venetorum. English
titleStmt.author: Contarini, Gasparo, 1483-1542.

titleStmt.title: The commonvvealth and gouernment of Venice. VVritten by the Cardinall Gasper Contareno, and translated out of Italian into English, by Lewes Lewkenor Esquire. VVith sundry other collections, annexed by the translator for the more cleere and exact satisfaction of the reader. With a short chronicle in the end, of the liues and raignes of the Venetian dukes, from the very beginninges of their citie
De magistribus et republica Venetorum. English
titleStmt.author: Contarini, Gasparo, 1483-1542.
Lewkenor, Lewis, Sir, d. 1626.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by Iohn Windet for Edmund Mattes, and are to be sold at his shop, at the signe of the Hand and Plow in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: A translation of an Italian translation of: De magistribus et republica Venetorum.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
